Subject: Re: Epstein SW returns 
Date: Mon, 12 Oct 2020 17:26:48 +0000 
The email you just forwarded us sounds like it's referring to what I  was talking about— Marty is a different 
attorney for Epstein. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 12, 2020, at 1:15 PM, > wrote: 
I've never dealt with them. Have you or Alex been dealing with Marc or Andrew? 
From: 
Sent: Monday, October 12, 2020 1:06 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Epstein SW returns 
Marc Weinstein and Andrew Tomback represent the co-executors of the estate (Darren Indyke and 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 12, 2020, at 12:55 PM, wrote: 
Who represents the estate? 
From: 
Sent: Monday, October 12, 2020 12:52 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Epstein SW returns 
Hi M, 
Thanks— from what I remember, the estate communicated with you directly about this, so I don't remember getting a 
list. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 12, 2020, at 12:38 PM, wrote: 
Hi 
Hope you're well too. Did Epstein's lawyers also give you the list of attorneys? And can you remind me who they 
are? 
EFTA00026834

Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Monday, October 12, 2020 11:50 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Epstein SW returns 
Hi-, 
Hope you're doing well, and thanks very much for your help with privilege issues for this review. In our review of this 
database, we have come across some communications (emails and reports)from private investigators— among 
others, an investigator named Roy Black. We are generally aware that Epstein hired private investigators in 
connection with a criminal investigation and related civil litigation in Florida. 
We don't know whether these materials are privileged. Could you possibly confer with the estate attorneys to 
determine whether they are asserting a privilege over communications by private investigators? In the meantime, we 
will stop reviewing the database unless we hear from you otherwise. 
Thanks very much, 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 12, 2020, at 10:53 AM, 
Thanks very much, 
•. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, October 12, 2020 10:51 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein SW returns 
The Goldberger hits have been moved out. 
Thanks, 
> 
<

they are moved out.
